TopicTitle: Science not received for some experiments when transmitted

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I'm having trouble receiving science from several probes I've launched into solar and lunar orbits. When I try to transmit data from Mystery Goo or Materials Bay experiments, as well as several science modules from the DMagic science mod, the antenna(e) on the spacecraft will run through the typical transmission process - the percentage counter will run up and electric charge will drain as usual - but once the transmission is "Done!", nothing happens. For the expendable experiments, they behave as if the data was successfully removed and transmitted (they become inoperable), but the space center never receives science rewards for these transmissions. This is extremely frustrating since the entire point of these probe missions is to gather enough science to later launch a manned mission where I will be able to recover the full science reward anyway. The only experiments that successfully transmit any data are the Temperature Scan, Atmospheric Pressure Scan, and Geiger Counter, all of which work exactly as intended.

I have checked that these spacecraft have electrical power available, made sure they are within transmission range, re-ran the experiment and data transmission process after restarting the game and my computer, tried with the [x] Science! mod removed, tried to relaunch the spacecraft, and probably some other stuff I can't remember. Nothing seems to help the problem. Nothing even seems out of place aside from the missing science credit. Does anyone have any experience with a problem like this, or any idea what might be the problem?

If you want any more specific information about the situation, just ask.

Thanks in advance!

Details:

I am currently using KSP 1.22.

Mods I currently have installed:

  • [x] Science! *
  • Advanced Jet Engine
  • B9 Aerospace Procedural Wings
  • Community Tech Tree
  • Deadly Reentry
  • DMagic Orbital Science *
  • FASA
  • Ferram Aerospace Research
  • Hangar Extender
  • Half Scale Real Solar System
  • Hide Empty Tech Tree Nodes
  • Kerbal Engineer Redux
  • Kerbal Joint Reinforcement
  • KSC Switcher
  • Near Future Electrical
  • Near Future Solar
  • Procedural Parts
  • RealChute
  • RealFuels
  • RealHeat
  • Realism Overhaul (includes some other mods listed here, and some besides)
  • RealPlume
  • Retractable Lifting Surface
  • RN's Soviet Rockets
  • SCANsat *
  • Soviet Engines
  • Texture Replacer
  • Unmanned Before Manned

           *I would guess that these mods would be related to the problem, but I can't figure it out on my own

Mods represented in spacecraft components:

  • DMagic Orbital Science
  • FASA
  • RealFuels
  • Realism Overhaul
  • SCANsat
